subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Linas Kleiza recovered the ball in a scramble and hit a jumper just before the final buzzer sounded Sunday night, lifting the Denver Nuggets to a thrilling 106-105 victory over the host Sacramento Kings.
snippet: Linas Kleiza recovered the ball in a scramble and hit a jumper just before the final buzzer sounded Sunday night, lifting the Denver Nuggets to a thrilling 106-105 victory over the host Sacramento Kings.
